experience.title: Sales Account Executive
experience.description: - Managed and grew a portfolio of 250+ strategic commercial clients for APAC(India)-Achieved 120% of annual sales quota, driving $1M in revenue growth throughstrategic upselling, cross-selling, and maintaining a 3X sales pipeline.- Generated new sales leads through cold calling and networking activities.-Collaborated with marketing, deal management, BDRs, OEMs, field, and operationsteams to execute campaigns, call blitzes, and events.-Leveraged VMware portfolio to help customers with their data center modernization,accelerate transitions to hybrid/multi-cloud infrastructure, and enhance end usercomputing experiences.-Aligned with Channel Managers, PBM, to establish performance objectives andmilestones, fostering productive partner relationships.-Negotiated pricing contracts with customers to maximize profits.-Collaborated with CXOs and LOB heads to identify pain points, manage stakeholderrelationships, and propose solutions.-Performed regular follow-ups with prospects to close deals in a timely manner.
experience.description_html: - Managed and grew a portfolio of 250+ strategic commercial clients for APAC(India)-Achieved 120% of annual sales quota, driving $1M in revenue growth throughstrategic upselling, cross-selling, and maintaining a 3X sales pipeline.- Generated new sales leads through cold calling and networking activities.-Collaborated with marketing, deal management, BDRs, OEMs, field, and operationsteams to execute campaigns, call blitzes, and events.-Leveraged VMware portfolio to help customers with their data center modernization,accelerate transitions to hybrid/multi-cloud infrastructure, and enhance end usercomputing experiences.-Aligned with Channel Managers, PBM, to establish performance objectives andmilestones, fostering productive partner relationships.-Negotiated pricing contracts with customers to maximize profits.-Collaborated with CXOs and LOB heads to identify pain points, manage stakeholderrelationships, and propose solutions.-Performed regular follow-ups with prospects to close deals in a timely manner.

experience.title: Business Analyst - IB services, ELA
experience.description: •Validated and analyzed install base data to ensure accuracy and completeness,maintaining a reliable foundation for customer information in CRM systems.•Efficiently handled renewal requests, handling Global Accounts and EMEAregion for listed Perpetual and SaaS products, •Utilized data analysis techniques, create dashboards to identify insights and trends, enabling data-driven decision-making and enhancing operational efficiency.•Collaborated closely with the Sales team and Deal Management team to understanddeal significance and alignment with business objectives.•Provided advisory support to VMware's Sales teams, comprehensively explaining thescope of Enterprise License Agreements (ELA) through various communicationchannels, including calls, chats, and meetings and sales enablement programs (Recreated process documents with audio and video step by step)•Assisted in pricing eligible licenses within the new ELA, considering customerrequirements and contractual terms.
experience.description_html: •Validated and analyzed install base data to ensure accuracy and completeness,maintaining a reliable foundation for customer information in CRM systems.•Efficiently handled renewal requests, handling Global Accounts and EMEAregion for listed Perpetual and SaaS products, •Utilized data analysis techniques, create dashboards to identify insights and trends, enabling data-driven decision-making and enhancing operational efficiency.•Collaborated closely with the Sales team and Deal Management team to understanddeal significance and alignment with business objectives.•Provided advisory support to VMware's Sales teams, comprehensively explaining thescope of Enterprise License Agreements (ELA) through various communicationchannels, including calls, chats, and meetings and sales enablement programs (Recreated process documents with audio and video step by step)•Assisted in pricing eligible licenses within the new ELA, considering customerrequirements and contractual terms.

experience.title: Sales And Marketing Intern
experience.description: Project was on “The Strategic Revival of the South 1 Market Region for FMCG products in BritanniaIndustries Ltd”. This project included the states of Andhra Pradesh and parts of Telanganaand Karnataka during the COVID 19 environment.•Working with different channel partners to develop strategies for effective day today operations.•Implementing strategies for geotagging of outlets for optimizing beat routes.•Provided financial advisory solutions for the ROI of channel partners

experience.title: Student Intern
experience.description: Actively prospecting, cold calling for potential customers using Facebook and LinkedIn tools. Handled meeting with potential customers and converted them into using the services which was based on subscription model. Also involved cross selling and up selling of services offered by Kidengage to bring in more revenue to the organization.
